text: maybe Vatican City will be the first country to complete vaccination, they already received enough vials for the entire population :joy:

text: Vaccinating 90% of the population in a country with 1.000 people takes as long as vaccinating 90% of the population in a country with 1.000.000 people vaccines provided.

text: rollout of the vaccine is greatly slowed down by distribution though, I don't think any other country already got enough doses to cover entire population
